text: Ara sekhane tara artanada karabe -- ''amadera prabhu! Amadera bera kare ano, amara bhalo kaja karaba, -- ta byatita ya amara karatama.’’''Amara ki tomadera dirghajibana di'i ni yena, ye manoyoga dite caya se sekhane manoyoga dite pare, ara tomadera kache satarkakari'o esechilena? Ta'i asbadana kara, ara an'yayakaridera jan'ya kono sahayyakari ne'i.’’
